page.title: 18LEISURE
page.content: Within Catterick Garrison there are numerous clubs and societies but many only cater for Service Personel and their dependents,such as the all weather swimming pool.Some Service facilities that civilians can join are Sub Aqua Club,Saddle Club and Ski Club (which has the largest indoor slope in the UK 137ft X 52ft with a nursery slope,fully equipped and BASI instructors).There is a beautiful Golf Club with 6332yd course 71Par and 2 practice grounds. There are 2 Youth Clubs,a County one on the Garrison and one in Scotton Village hall,which has a very young section. There are many activies for children to join such as ballet,dance,judo,Scouts and Guides. Moves are being made for a BMX bike course. A park to commemorate the Coronation Queen Elizabeth II has swings,gardens and a Band stand.
